CsGL.Util
Class Mouse

System.Object
   |
   +--OSLib
         |
         +--Mouse
   in Mouse.cs
class Mouse
extends OSLib

a class to access mouse position from anywhere. You could also use it to pin the mouse in one position and just use mouse move delta.

It also enable you to create System.Drawing.Cursor object from a System.Drawing.Bitmap image

Method Detail

AddListener

public static void AddListener( Hook fct );

CreateCursor

public static Cursor CreateCursor( Bitmap img, int x, int y );
This method create a cursor from a bitmap. provided you furnish with a bitmap of an acceptable system size.

You should call DestroyCursor(..) on this cursor when you no longer need it

Parameters:
x - the x-coordinate of the hot spot
y - the y-coordinate of the hot spot

DestroyCursor

public static void DestroyCursor( Cursor cur );
Destroy a cursor. This method should only be called on unused cursor created by Mouse.CreateCursor(..).
I am sorry to not provide a more witty implementation but Cursor is a sealed class, I can't help.
